Car ID Car Name Brand ID Color ID Model Year Daily Price Description
{{car.carId}} {{car.carName}} {{car.brandId}} {{car.colorId}} {{car.modelYear}} {{car.dailyPrice}} {{car.descriptions}}
import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { Car } from 'src/app/models/car'; import { CarService } from 'src/app/sevices/car.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-car', templateUrl: './car.component.html', styleUrls: ['./car.component.css'] }) export class CarComponent implements OnInit{ cars:Car[]=[]; constructor(private carService:CarService){} ngOnInit():void{ this.getCars(); } getCars(){ this.carService.getCars().subscribe((response: { data: Car[]; }) => {this.cars = response.data}); } }
